name: p-cyanophenol
Reason: 1-ethylpiperazine-2,3-dione base melting point is around 106°C. The cyano group introduces a strong withdrawing group, increasing intermolecular forces and melting point by approximately +50°C. The phenol group introduces a hydroxyl functional group, which can participate in hydrogen bonding, raising the melting point by approximately +20°C. The methyl group introduces a bulky side chain, which can sterically hinder the crystal lattice, raising the melting point by approximately +5°C.
